column4: so anyone had issues with the binary nvidia driver and sometimes window content not being refreshed? or am i the only one.
i open firefox with about 14 windows and i have to resize them to get the windows to refresh
not seen anyone else say that since 9.04 came out. Tried a google search?
haven't really seen anything yet, first time i've ever seen such a thing happen, switched from fc10 hehe
